REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0339 reute u f BC-BABCOCK-UNIT-WINS-ORD 03-25 0067

TEXT.TITLE: BABCOCK UNIT WINS ORDER FOR VENEZUELAN POWER PLANT
TEXT.BODY: Deutsche Babcock AG <DBCG.F> said its wholly-owned Borsig GmbH subsidiary has won a 78 mln mark order to build a conventional power station block for Venezuela's state-owned electricity company CADAFE. It said the installation, which can be powered by oil or gas, should go on stream at the end of 1988. REUTER
